actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,520 the amount of outside income which (subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted each year without deductions from benefits, and to provide that income of all types and from all sources shall be included in determining whether an individual's benefits are subject to such deductions.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $3,520 the amount of outside income which (subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted each year without deductions from benefits under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act. Provides that income of all types and from all sources shall be included in determining whether an individual's benefits are subject to such deductions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,520 the amount of outside income which (subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted each year without deductions from benefits, and to provide that income of all types and from all sources shall be included in determining whether an individual's benefits are subject to such deductions.
